bg-color.description: Applies specified color to the control’s background. Used on components that also support the color prop. - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
bg-color.description_zh: 将指定的颜色应用于控件的背景。用于也支持 color 属性的组件。- 支持实用工具颜色（例如 Success 或 Purple）或 CSS 颜色（#033 或 RGBA（255， 0， 0， 0.5））。在 colors 页面上查找内置类的列表。

collapse-icon.description: Icon used when the expansion panel is in a collapsable state.
collapse-icon.description_zh: 当扩展面板处于可折叠状态时使用的图标。

color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
color.description_zh: 将指定的颜色应用于控件 - 支持实用工具颜色（例如 success 或紫色）或 css 颜色（#033 或 rgba（255， 0， 0， 0.5））。在 colors 页面上查找内置类的列表。

eager.description: Forces the component’s content to render when it mounts. This is useful if you have content that will not be rendered in the DOM that you want crawled for SEO.
eager.description_zh: 强制组件的内容在挂载时呈现。如果您的内容不会在 DOM 中呈现，并且您希望为 SEO 抓取，这将非常有用。

elevation.description: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the elevation page.
elevation.description_zh: 指定应用于组件的 0 到 24 之间的高程。您可以在海拔页面上找到更多信息。

expand-icon.description: Icon used when the expansion panel is in a expandable state.
expand-icon.description_zh: 当扩展面板处于可展开状态时使用的图标。

focusable.description_zh: 缺少描述（在 github 中编辑）

height.description: Sets the height for the component.

hide-actions.description: Hide the expand icon in the content title.
hide-actions.description_zh: 隐藏内容标题中的展开图标。

max-height.description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

min-height.description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

readonly.description: Makes the expansion-panel content read only.
readonly.description_zh: 将扩展面板内容设置为只读。

rounded.description: Designates the border-radius applied to the component. This can be 0, xs, sm, true, lg, xl, pill, circle, and shaped. Find more information on available border radius classes on the Border Radius page.
rounded.description_zh: 指定应用于组件的 border-radius。这可以是 0、xs、sm、true、lg、xl、pill、circle 和 shaped。在 Border Radius 页面上查找有关可用边界半径类的更多信息。

selected-class.description: Configure the active CSS class applied when an item is selected.
selected-class.description_zh: 配置在选择项目时应用的活动 CSS 类。

static.description: Remove title size expansion when selected.
static.description_zh: 选中后删除标题大小扩展。

tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.
tag.description_zh: 指定根元素上使用的自定义标记。

text.description: Specify content text for the component.

tile.description: Removes any applied border-radius from the component.
tile.description_zh: 从组件中删除任何应用的 border-radius。

title.description: Specify a title text for the component.

value.description: Controls the opened/closed state of content.
value.description_zh: 控制内容的打开/关闭状态。

width.description: Sets the width for the component.

events.name: group:selected
events.description: Event that is emitted when an item is selected within a group.
events.description_zh: 在组中选择项时发出的事件。

slots.name: text
slots.description: Slot for the component’s text content.

slots.name: title
slots.description: Slot for the component’s title content.

exposed.name: groupItem
exposed.detail:
{
  id: number
  isSelected: boolean
  isFirst: boolean
  isLast: boolean
  toggle: () => void
  select: (value: boolean) => void
  selectedClass: false | (string | undefined)[]
  value: unknown
  disabled: boolean | undefined
  group: {
    register: (item: GroupItem, cmp: ComponentInternalInstance) => void
    unregister: (id: number) => void
    select: (id: number, value: boolean) => void
    selected: readonly number[]
    isSelected: (id: number) => boolean
    prev: () => void
    next: () => void
    selectedClass: string | undefined
    items: { id: number; value: unknown; disabled: boolean | undefined }[]
    disabled: boolean | undefined
    getItemIndex: (value: unknown) => number
  }
}
